page.title: 08ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Knighton does not have a cinema or a recognised theatre.Any films or plays have to be staged at the Pimary School Hall or the Community Centre.As the acoustics are so poor at the Community Centre the School Hall is used more often.The local entertainments group {Teme Spirits}produce musicals and pantomimes each year.{Theatre Powys who are sponsored by the South Wales Arts Council produce plays for adults and schools each year.The{Knighton {Concert Society}pay for well known solo instrumentalists,trios,quartets and choirs to give concerts each season.Concerts by the{Knighton Town {Band }supported by local choirs and choirs from outside the area take place in the School Hall.{Discos}are held often in the Community Centre to raise money for local organisations
